ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.models

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.models.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public class Comment
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    A comment within a thread of comments. Contains the text of the comment, possibly an image, and meta-data relating to the Comment.
    Author:
    Henry Pabst, Artem Chikin

      • findCommentById

        public Comment findCommentById(Comment parent,
                      String id)
        Searches a parent Comment's children recursively for a Comment by its ElasticSearch id.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent Comment
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the Comment if found, or null if not found

      • getDistanceFrom

        public double getDistanceFrom(GeoLocation geo)
        Determines the distance between a comment and a GeoLocation in terms of latitude and longitude coordinates.
        Parameters:
        geo - The GeoLocation to be compared with.
        Returns:
        The distance between the Comment and the passed GeoLocation in terms of coordinates.

      • getTimeFrom

        public double getTimeFrom(Date date)
        Determines the amount of time between when the Comment was posted and the passed date in terms of hours.
        Parameters:
        date - The Date to be compared with.
        Returns:
        The number of hours between when the Comment was posted and the passed Date.

      • getScoreFromParent

        @Deprecated
public double getScoreFromParent()
        Deprecated. 
        Determines the "score" of the Comment in relation to its parent. Should never be called on the bodyComment of a ThreadComment, and will return 0 if it does.
        Returns:
        The score of the Comment in relation to its parent.

      • getScoreFromUser

        public double getScoreFromUser(GeoLocation geo)
        Determines the score of a comment in a thread relevant to the user's current location and time.
        Parameters:
        geo - The current GeoLocation of the user. In sorting, the Thread.sortLoc GeoLocation of the sorting thread is used and should be set in the fragment.
        Returns:
        The score of the comment in relation to the user's location and current time.

      • findThread

        public ThreadComment findThread()
        Searches the ThreadList for the ThreadComment containing this Comment.
        Returns:
        the ThreadComment of the Comment if found, or null if not found

      • getCommentDateString

        public String getCommentDateString()
        Converts the Comment's commentDate to an appropriately formatted string.
        Returns:
        The string of the Comment's commentDate.
